code: import{useEffect}from'react';var useTypingAnimation=function useTypingAnimation(words,index,setIndex,reverse,setReverse,subIndex,setSubIndex){useEffect(function(){if(subIndex===words[index].length+1&&!reverse){setReverse(true);return;}if(subIndex===0&&reverse){setReverse(false);index===words.length-1?setIndex(0):setIndex(function(prev){return prev+1;});return;}var timeout=setTimeout(function(){setSubIndex(function(prev){return prev+(reverse?-1:1);});},Math.max(reverse?75:subIndex===words[index].length?1000:150,parseInt(Math.random()*1000)));return function(){return clearTimeout(timeout);};},[subIndex,index,reverse,setIndex,setReverse,setSubIndex,words]);};export default useTypingAnimation;
